channel.title: Help on 508 server
channel.description: I download 508 server and clinet (also the chache)... first i need to run the server becauze if not i will get "error_game_js5connect" right? ... so i try to open the source and i dont know what to open. there are some folders like "bin" "cmd" "src" .. i dont find nothing like run on "bin" and "src" so i open the "cmd" in "cmd" i found folders like "all"-"rs2"-"run"-"rs2.npcs" and more... i need to open the "run" one right? so when i try to open its says the system cannot find the path specified. press any key to continue.. what i need to do ??? also when i try to open souce (not 508) its says "error_game_js5connect" too please help me some one.. !!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 07:11:53 am[/size][hr]help any one !!! sorry for double post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 09:51:35 am[/size][hr]please some one help me !!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Help on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @uop81 uop81
item.description:
@uop81 wrote:

1.go to my computer
2.click local disk c((it opens c documents))
3. look for the file ““program files”“open it and then click show folders
4. look for the file name”“java”” and open it
5.look for the newest file mine is jre1.6.0_07
ok on mine u see the _07 thats the type
look at your newest type like mabey _07 like mine??
ok go to run and right click and click edit
put this if it was _07

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Help on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @1993ranger2 1993ranger2
item.description:
@1993ranger2 wrote:

I download 508 server and clinet (also the chache)… first i need to run the server becauze if not i will get
“error_game_js5connect” right? … so i try to open the source and i dont know what to open. there are some
folders like “bin” “cmd” “src” … i dont find nothing like run on “bin” and “src” so i open the “cmd”
in “cmd” i found folders like “all”-“rs2”-“run”-“rs2.npcs” and more…
i need to open the “run” one right?
so when i try to open its says
the system cannot find the path specified.
press any key to continue…
what i need to do ???
also when i try to open souce (not 508) its says “error_game_js5connect” too
please help me some one… !!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 07:11:53 am[/size][hr]help any one !!!
sorry for double post[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 09:51:35 am[/size][hr]please some one help me !!!
